original_text: Now I am writing these last words to you myself. You can see how large the letters are, when I write them with my own hand!
korean_text: 내 손으로 너희에게 이렇게 큰 글자로 쓴 것을 보라

sentences.original_text: Now I am writing these last words to you myself
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 이제 마지막 말들을 직접 너희에게 쓰고 있다

sentences.original_text: You can see how large the letters are
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 글자들이 얼마나 큰지 볼 수 있다

sentences.original_text: when I write them with my own hand
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 직접 내 손으로 쓸 때
